content.text: I love the sound of the rain.
I do too! I like to dance in it sometimes.
That sounds like fun! I like to listen to it while I read.
I bet that's nice. I like to play jazz piano when it rains.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I'm not musically inclined.
It's not too hard to learn! I started when I was 6.
That's impressive! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.
Maybe I will. I need to find some time.
I'm sure you'll have fun if you do.
Thanks! I hope you have a nice day.
